channel.title: Anyone got | 100% Cooking|
channel.description: Does anyone have 100% brewing, gnome cooking, etc on their servers?

item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus

Ya, it’s only taken me like 3 days for 2 hours a day to get that far. ^_^. I havent even got to the hard skills yet >.<

item.title: Anyone got | 100% Cooking|
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

zyle1992:

Well, my server im making from absolute scratch will have ABSOLUTELY EVERY cooking item. Right now, ive used about… 2285 lines of code. All that’s in there is, pies, pizzas, Drinks(Slayer’s Respite, Dragon Bitter, etc), Cocktails, Crunchies, Battas, and Bowls. I havent done like cooking the Lobsters or anything like that yet.

To make everything that would involve me not having a life, therefore not possible.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone got | 100% Cooking|
item.dc:creator: @Java_Is_My_Bitch Java Is My Bitch™
item.description:
@Java_Is_My_Bitch wrote:

What i could scrap Up:

[code]else if (useItemID == 349 && atObjectID == 2728)//Using raw pike on range
{
if(playerLevel[7] >= 0) {
deleteItem(349, GetItemSlot(349), 1);
addItem(351,1);
startAnimation(883);
addSkillXP(70, 7);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a cooking level of 0 to cook a pike !”);
}
}

else if (useItemID == 359 && atObjectID == 2728)//Using raw tuna on range
{
if(playerLevel[7] >= 15) {
deleteItem(359, GetItemSlot(359), 1);
addItem(361,1);
startAnimation(883);
addSkillXP(120, 7);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a cooking level of 15 to cook a tuna !”);
}
}

else if (useItemID == 377 && atObjectID == 2728)//Using raw lobster on range
{
if(playerLevel[7] >= 45) {
deleteItem(377, GetItemSlot(377), 1);
addItem(379,1);
startAnimation(883);
addSkillXP(550, 7);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a cooking level of 45 to cook a Lobster !”);
}
}

else if (useItemID == 371 && atObjectID == 2728)//Using raw Swordfish on range
{
if(playerLevel[7] >= 30) {
deleteItem(371, GetItemSlot(371), 1);
addItem(373,1);
startAnimation(883);
addSkillXP(225, 7);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a cooking level of 30 to cook a swordfish !”);
}
}

else if (useItemID == 389 && atObjectID == 2728)//Using raw manta ray on range
{
if(playerLevel[7] >= 90) {
deleteItem(389, GetItemSlot(389), 1);
addItem(391,1);
startAnimation(883);
addSkillXP(1250, 7);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a cooking level of 90 to cook a manta !”);
}
}

else if (useItemID == 383 && atObjectID == 2728)//Using raw shark on range
{
if(playerLevel[7] >= 70) {
deleteItem(383, GetItemSlot(383), 1);
addItem(385,1);
startAnimation(883);
addSkillXP(700, 7);
} else {
sendMessage(“You need a cooking level of 70 to cook a shark !”);
}
}[/code]

I’ll get the real deal when i finish making other handlers, but it won’t be full, no need for new cooking items, and there are soo much. Cake, bread, stews, etc, just too much.

Read full topic
